Literature.Title: Paenibacterin, a novel broad-spectrum lipopeptide antibiotic, neutralises endotoxins and promotes survival in a murine model of Pseudomonas aeruginosa-induced sepsis
Literature.Author: Huang E, Yousef AE

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=8µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-747(MIC=2µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=2µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=4-8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=8-32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=16µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=8µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 700802(MIC=64µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 49619(MIC=64µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 14579(MIC=16µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes Scott A(MIC=2µg/ml)
